commit.message:
re PR libfortran/61049 (NIST test FM906 fails)

2014-05-06  Jerry DeLisle  <jvdelisle@gcc.gnu>

	PR libfortran/61049
	* io/list_read.c (list_formatted_read_scalar): Use eat_separator
	and delete extraneous code.

From-SVN: r210134
